abort.single_instance_allowed: Already configured. Only a single configuration possible.

user.description: Do you want to set up Livemasjid?
user.title: Set up Livemasjid

init.title: Livemasjid Configuration
init.description:
Please select your Primary Subscription, Optional subscriptions as well as other streams of interest.

The Primary subscription will always be streamed when that stream starts.

Alternate streams will be available as entities and will keep their states updated.

You can also select your preferred media player device and optionally alternate media players.
